Contact Us

City of Hallettsville
City Hall
101 N. Main Street
Hallettsville, Texas 77964
Phone: (361) 798-3681
Fax: (361) 798-5952
Lobby Hours: 9AM - 4PM
Phone Hours: 8AM - 4:30PM
